metadata.title: CVE-2023-34854 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
[Authenticated remote code execution via backup/restore in HotelDruid]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-34854` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

hoteldruid - 3.0.6-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: hoteldruid package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.0.6-1').
